programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Hyacinth decides to have a second attempt at finding a weekend home in the country and Elizabeth is called in to help her on her property search. Her final choice is `interesting' to say the least and worries Richard enormously.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Charlie Ross presents from a very rainy Newark with experts Charles Hanson and Philip Serrell. The reds and blues battle against the elements, hoping to bag themselves a bargain and make a profit at auction.
